note.p: Death: Norfolk Street, Strand, London (12 or 17 April 1732)
Burial: St Clement Danes church, London (24 April 1732)
Education: Brasenose College, Oxford. BA (1715), MA (1718), BMed (1724), DMed (1724)
Notes: Foster says baptised at Nantwich 8 May 1694. Gent's Mag gives date of death as 17 April 1732, Munk says died 12 April and buried 24 April
